divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving Rt220 going towards State College, PA from Bellefonte, PA. When I notices bright lights in the shape of an octagon over a tree line ahead. First I thought it was street lights on the side of the parkway but as I drove closer it took shape in the sky. I couldn't determine the size of the object as I could only see the lights in the sky. It looked to be hovering in a stationary position over the tree line. The lights were about 50ft to 100ft apart from eachother in the shape of an octagon there where 5 lights overall. All I know I wasn't staying around to find out what it exactly was so I went back to my hotel. While I was driving away it looked to be slowly moving towards the sky. And then in a matter of seconds it disapeared from my sight. The following morning I drove by the area to see if there were anything I could have mistaken it with and there was only forest. I have always been entriged by UFO's and researched them as a kid but experiencing it first hand was more than what I expected. It is very scary because of the whole concept of the unknown but also cool as I thought I would never see something like this in my lifetime. I placed an attachment of what I seen I did take a picture on my cell phone only it took a black photo but I drew a little something to give everyone an idea...
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in State College
There were no other sightings in State College on or around August 18th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I thought it wasn't real but it was
